comment: select user.id from user, user_extra, user_metadata, music, unsharded, unsharded_a, unsharded_b, unsharded_auto, music_extra where user.id = user_extra.user_id and user_metadata.user_id = user_extra.user_id and music.id = music_extra.music_id and unsharded.x = unsharded_a.y
query: select user.id from user, user_extra, user_metadata, music, unsharded, unsharded_a, unsharded_b, unsharded_auto, music_extra where user.id = user_extra.user_id and user_metadata.user_id = user_extra.user_id and music.id = music_extra.music_id and unsharded.x = unsharded_a.y

plan.Original: select user.id from user, user_extra, user_metadata, music, unsharded, unsharded_a, unsharded_b, unsharded_auto, music_extra where user.id = user_extra.user_id and user_metadata.user_id = user_extra.user_id and music.id = music_extra.music_id and unsharded.x = unsharded_a.y

Instructions.TableName: music, music_extra_`user`, user_extra, user_metadata_unsharded, unsharded_a, unsharded_auto, unsharded_b

Inputs.Query: select 1 from music, music_extra where music.id = music_extra.music_id
select `user`.id from `user`, user_extra, user_metadata where `user`.id = user_extra.user_id and user_metadata.user_id = user_extra.user_id
